description:
Yuka is very worried after being placed in the dodgeball event, her least favorite, in her school`s upcoming ball sports meet. So the gang decides to try intensive training so that she`ll no longer be scared to play dodgeball! Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to order something for their training, and the result is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Supopopo! Yuuka no Dodgeball Tokkun Dechi!
スポポポ! ゆーかのドッジボール特訓でち!
